data.name: Caravanserai Desert Dinner With Optional Transfers
data.description:
Take a step back in time and explore an ancient culture with a modern twist accompanied with dining experience.

What to Expect

The adventure begins when your guide picks you up from your hotel in Dubai to caravanserai desert camp for a buffet style dining experience. Embark on a traditional buffet dinner, followed by authentic Bedouin live performances. Find all you need, to immerse yourself in the ultimate Arabian experience.

Highlights
  • Caravanserai camp: Take a journey with us and step into a world of traditional style with a touch of luxury and authentic camp experience.
  • 5-star Arabian (inspired buffet): Indulge in an array of dishes that represents the finest Arabian cuisine, carefully curated to delight your senses.
  • Live shows: Immerse yourself in the captivating Arabian culture with live performances.
What's Included in the ticket
  • Pick up and drop off service
  • Camel riding
  • Henna painting
  • Belly dance, fire dance and more
  • Fire show
  • Air-conditioned 4x4 vehicle
  • Live Barbecue
  • International 5-star buffet
  • Water and soft drinks
What's not Included in the ticket
  • Anything not mentioned in Inculsions
  • Dune bashing
Timing's
  • Tour timing's: 06:00 p.m. to 09:00 p.m.
  • Tour Operates on daily basis
  • Pick up will be in between 05:00 p.m. to 05:30 p.m.
Commence your journey as your guide collects you from your Dubai hotel, heading to the Caravanserai Desert Camp by Tour Dubai for a buffet-style dining escapade. Indulge in a traditional buffet dinner and relish authentic Bedouin live performances. Everything you require for the quintessential Arabian experience awaits at the Caravanserai Luxury Camp in Dubai.
data.text_teaser: Explore ancient culture with a modern twist, paired with a dining experience!

data.name: Discover Scuba Dive at Fujairah
data.description:
Discover the marine world under the sea and learn the basics of scuba diving at Fujairah.


What To Expect

 Explore the colorful corals and tropical marine life of Fujairah and learn how to dive with the help of certified instructors in this beginner-level scuba diving lesson. 



  Highlights

- A perfect opportunity to try scuba diving and explore the underwater world with no prior experience required.
- Explore the Fujairah coast and try scuba diving with no commitment to a longer program.
- Learn the basics of scuba diving with the help of certified diving instructors.
- Discover the Arabian waters with one of the best scuba diving Fujairah experiences. 



What’s included in the ticket

 - One 2-3 Hour Scuba Diving Session with Certified Instructors.
- Scuba Diving Suit and Equipment.
- Unlimited Soft Drinks and Water.



Timing: 

 8:30 a.m, 1:30 p.m.  



Ticket Information: 


- Discover Scuba Dive at Fujairah ticket sales are final and are 100% non-refundable.
- Visitors are not allowed to bring food or beverages, glassware, or alcohol into the premises.
- Please carry a valid photo ID with you.
- Book online in advance to redeem the best deals and offers.


Important things to know before your visit

 - Discover Scuba Dive at the Fujairah Dress Code: Comfortable swimming attire and footwear are required.
- Discover Scuba Dive at Fujairah

Age and Health Restrictions:
- Participants must be 10 years or older.
- Participants must be fit to dive.
- Participants must pass a dive medical questionnaire.
- Please bring a towel and a change of clothes.
- Transportation pick up and drop off from Dubai to Fujairah is available
- Transportation costs may vary on the time trip.


Address: Nemo Diving Center Dubai, Fujairah, UAE

How to get there:


 By car: Nemo Diving Center is located in Fujairah, which is easily accessible by car. You can park the car in the designated parking for a small fee.  

By taxi: You can also take a taxi to the location from anywhere in Dubai. It’s a popular destination, and most taxi drivers will be familiar with the location. Explore the colorful corals and tropical marine life of Fujairah and learn how to dive with the help of certified instructors in this beginner-level scuba diving lesson.
data.text_teaser: Discover the marine world under the sea and learn the basics of scuba diving at Fujairah.

data.name: Wind Rises Sailing Rides & Races
data.description:
Wind Rises is creating a new image for sail culture and forming a community around sailing.

Here, you will learn how to operate the boat, steer it along a course, adjust the sails, and execute basic maneuvers either with other participants or with the help of  our instructor and will take care of all the boat handling while you relax, enjoy the sea views, catch the wind, and capturing memorable photos of your amazing day on the water	Wind Rises is creating a new image for sail culture and forming a community around sailing.   Here, you will learn how to operate the boat, steer it along a course, adjust the sails, and execute basic maneuvers either with other participants or with the help of  our instructor and will take care of all the boat handling while you relax, enjoy the sea views, catch the wind, and capturing memorable photos of your amazing day on the water

data.name: Gravity Indoor Skydiving
data.description:
Immerse yourself in the exhilarating world of indoor skydiving at "Gravity Indoor Skydiving," located in the heart of Manama. This state-of-the-art attraction offers a thrilling experience where you can feel the sensation of freefalling and learn the art of human body flight in one of the world's largest indoor wind tunnels. With expert instructors, top-of-the-line equipment, and a focus on safety, "Gravity Indoor Skydiving" provides a unique and unforgettable adventure for individuals of all skill levels.

Highlights
  • Feel the rush of wind as you float effortlessly in the massive indoor wind tunnel, replicating the sensation of a real skydive without the need for an airplane.
  • Receive guidance from experienced instructors who will teach you the techniques of body flight. Learn how to maneuver your body, maintain stability, and perform exhilarating tricks as you soar through the air.
  • Capture your moments of soaring through the air on camera to share with friends and family
What’s included in the ticket
Access to Gravity Indoor Skydiving.    

Timing: 
  • From Tuesday to Saturday from Tuesday to Saturday from 1:00 p.m. to 09:00 p.m.
  • Closed on Sunday and Monday
  • Please be present at Gravity Indoor Skydiving 1 hour before their flight time.
Ticket Information:

  • Gravity Indoor Skydiving ticket sales are final and are 100% non-refundable. 
Important things to know before your visit
 Gravity Indoor Skydiving Dress Code: Upon arrival, customers are kindly requested to wear sneakers and socks.

Age and Health Restrictions:
  • Participants must not have a history of neck, back or heart problems and is not claustrophobic.
  • Participants must not be intoxicated or has taken any medication which is likely to interfere with the ability to flight.
  • The maximum weight limit is 135 kg. 
  • It is recommended that participants be at least 4 years old and weigh at least 15 kg. For individuals under 4 years old or lighter than 15 kg, the parent or guardian assumes full responsibility.
How to get there:
By car: Take Sheikh Khalifa Bin Salman Highway (Highway 55) towards Manama and follow signs to the venue. Plan your journey in advance and allow for potential traffic delays.  

By taxi: You can also take a taxi to Gravity Indoor Skydiving from anywhere in Manama. It's a famous destination and most drivers will be familiar with the location. Indoor Skydiving: Gravity Indoor Skydiving, Manama Get ready to enter the action-packed world of Indoor Skydiving at Gravity Indoor Skydiving, right in the heart of Bahrain.    

Indoor Skydiving is a one-of-a-kind venue that will surely provide you with an amazing indoor skydiving experience. 

There, you'll get to feel the sensation of freefalling through one of the world's largest wind tunnels. You don't have to worry about having experience as it caters to all skill levels, so whether you're a beginner or an experienced flyer, this is one of, if not the best indoor skydiving facility where the daredevil inside you can be let loose.    

With expert instructors and world-class equipment, gravity Indoor Skydiving ensures safety first while still providing the ultimate adventure for all experience levels. This is the perfect opportunity to test your limits and learn the art of human body flight in a safe and controlled environment.
data.text_teaser: Create lasting memories as you defy gravity and experience the incredible sensation of flight!

data.name: Luxury Speed Boat Tour by The Black Boats
data.description: .	Join The Black Boats for an unforgettable speed boat tour experience in Dubai. Choose from the Dubai Atlantis Boat Tour, a leisurely cruise along the Marina Canal with stunning views of JBR and Atlantis the Palm, or the longer Burj Al Arab Boat Tour, a 100-minute journey taking in breathtaking views of Dubai's shoreline, including the iconic Burj Al Arab and Atlantis Hotel. Both tours offer plenty of opportunities to capture unforgettable memories of Dubai's most iconic landmarks.
data.text_teaser: Discover iconic landmarks. Choose Atlantis or Burj Al Arab routes, capture iconic views!

data.name: Lunch at Mundo
data.description:
Indulge your senses with a culinary journey at Mundo Restaurant A la carte lunch, where you will find an extensive array of international cuisines to satisfy every craving. Enjoy a variety of flavors from aromatic curries and spicy stir-fries to the freshness of crisp salads and succulent roasts. The restaurant also has a fantastic location at Jumeirah Emirates Tower, being in the heart of Dubai's financial district makes it easily accessible for everyone.

Highlights
  • The lunch A la carte at Mundo Restaurant provides an unforgettable dining experience that will leave you feeling completely satisfied. 
  • Indulge in our delicious pasta station where you can create your own pasta bowl with a choice of noodles and sauces to satisfy your taste buds.
  • Experience a new taste of sushi as our expert sushi chefs use only the freshest ingredients to create a wide selection of classic and innovative sushi rolls. 

What’s included in the ticket
  •  A la carte Lunch and Water
Not Included: 
  • Soft drinks
  • Alcoholic drinks

Important Update:

Please note that Mundo restaurant at Jumeirah Emirates Towers will be serving the a la carte menu for lunch instead of a Buffet, until the 15th of September 2024.   Guests will continue to be able to order 1 starter, 1 main course, and a dessert from the a la carte menu, at the same rate as the buffet.

Timing: 
Available throughout weekends and weekdays from 01:00 p.m. to 03:00 p.m.     

Ticket Information:

  • You can cancel your booking free of charge up to 48 hours before your visit date at Mundo. 
  • In case of late cancellations or no-shows, we will have to charge the full amount of the booking.
Important things to know before your visit
  • Lunch at Mundo Dress Code: Casual
  • Discounts or vouchers cannot be used in conjunction with an existing promotion, theme, brunch, event, or special occasion.
Age and health restrictions: 
  • The dining experience is suitable for people of all ages, including expecting mothers. 

Cancellation Policy:
  Up to 24 hours prior to visit date, cancelation is free of charge. Late cancelations and No shows will be fully charged.


How to get there:

By car: To reach Jumeirah Emirates Tower by car, you can take Sheikh Zayed Road towards Dubai and take the exit for World Trade Centre. Follow the signs to Jumeirah Emirates Towers.   

By public transportation: Jumeirah Emirates Tower is easily accessible by metro. You can take the Red Line and get off at the Emirates Towers station. The hotel is just a short walk from the station.  

By taxi: You can also take a taxi to the hotel from anywhere in Dubai. It’s a popular destination, and most taxi drivers will be familiar with the location. Indulge your senses with a culinary journey at Mundo Restaurant A la carte lunch, where you will find an extensive array of international cuisines to satisfy every craving.

Enjoy a variety of flavors from aromatic curries and spicy stir-fries to the freshness of crisp salads and succulent roasts.

The restaurant also has a fantastic location at Jumeirah Emirates Tower, being in the heart of Dubai's financial district makes it easily accessible for everyone.
data.text_teaser: ِEnjoy a wide variety of high-quality cuisines and an elegant atmosphere at Mundo Restaurant!

data.name: Mundo Dinner Themed Nights - Monday to Friday
data.description:
Indulge your taste buds in a world of flavor with our exquisite buffet at Mundo Restaurant Dubai. The buffet showcases the rich and aromatic spices of Indian cuisine, the bold and flavorful herbs of the Mediterranean, the fragrant and exotic aromas of the Middle East, and the umami-packed delights of Asia. The pasta station allows you to indulge in perfectly cooked pasta dishes, made to order just the way you like it. For sushi lovers, the sushi station offers a wide range of sushi and sashimi options, carefully prepared by our expert chefs. "


Highlights
The themed night schedule at Mundo Restaurant Dubai: 
  • Monday - Taste of the Sea - Seafood night
  • Tuesday -The Great Meat Feast - An evening for meat-lovers
  • Wednesday - Surf & Turf - Seafood and meat cuts
  • Thursday - Treasures of Arabia - Middle Eastern, North African and Levantine selections
  • Friday - Spice it up - Pan-Asian dishes
What’s included in the ticket
  • Buffet Dinner and Water
Not Included: 
  • Soft drinks
  • Alcoholic drinks
Timing: 
Mundo Dinner Themed Nights is available from Monday to Friday.  

Ticket Information: 
  • You can cancel your booking free of charge up to 48 hours before your visit date at Mundo. 
  • In case of late cancellations or no-shows, we will have to charge the full amount of the booking.
Important things to know before your visit
  • Mundo Dinner-Themed Nights Dress Code: Casual
  • Discounts or vouchers cannot be used in conjunction with an existing promotion, theme, brunch, event or special occasion.
Age and health restrictions: 
  • The dining experience is suitable for people of all ages, including expecting mothers. 
Cancellation policy
Up to 24 hours prior to visit date, cancelation is free of charge. Late cancelations and No shows will be fully charged.

How to get there:

By car: To reach Jumeirah Emirates Tower by car, you can take Sheikh Zayed Road towards Dubai and take the exit for World Trade Centre. Follow the signs to Jumeirah Emirates Towers.   

By public transportation: Jumeirah Emirates Tower is easily accessible by metro. You can take the Red Line and get off at the Emirates Towers station. The hotel is just a short walk from the station.  

By taxi: You can also take a taxi to the hotel from anywhere in Dubai. It’s a popular destination, and most taxi drivers will be familiar with the location. Indulge your taste buds in a world of flavor with our exquisite buffet at Mundo Restaurant Dubai. The buffet showcases the rich and aromatic spices of Indian cuisine, the bold and flavorful herbs of the Mediterranean, the fragrant and exotic aromas of the Middle East, and the umami-packed delights of Asia.  

The pasta station allows you to indulge in perfectly cooked pasta dishes, made to order just the way you like it. For sushi lovers, the sushi station offers a wide range of sushi and sashimi options carefully prepared by our expert chefs. "
data.text_teaser: Enjoy a global buffet blending Indian, Mediterranean, Middle Eastern, and Asian cuisines!

data.name: Dubai Private City Tour with Transfers
data.description:
Come and join our tour and you will discover more of the hidden secrets of this town with our friendly English Speaking Tour Guide. We will take you through the heart of Dubai and explore a fascinating morning tour. The most modern and most desired tourist destination, which has lot to surprise any tourist who arrives in Dubai. We will have a start with a Visit to Gold Souk and Spice Souk. From there, you will have a chance to buy a souvenirs from your Love ones. there will be a drive through "Dubai Frame" which is the World's largest frame and then drive towards the Burj Khalifa in Sheikh Zayed Road and proceed to Palm Island and have a photo stop at "The Pointe" where you will have the stunning view of Atlantis The Palm, we will also visit Madinat Souk where you will see the fascinating "Burj Al Arab”and drive back to hotel.

Highlights
  •  Visit to Gold Souk n Spice Souk by Abra
  •  Visit to Marjan Gallery Drive through Sheikh Zayed Road 
  •  Photostop at Madinat Jumeirah Souk for Burj Al Arab
  •  photo Photostop at the Pointe

Inclusions:  
  • Pick up and drop off with private transfer 
  • 4 hours tour with English speaking chauffeur for half day
  • 8 hours  tour with English speaking chauffeur if you select the full day
  Exclusions:
  • Ticket entry to any attraction
  • Food and drinks
  • Any souvenirs 


Timing: 
Full-day Tour: 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. (8 hours)
Half-day Tour: 9 a.m. to 1 p.m. (4 hours)  

Ticket Information:  
  • Children under 3 years can join the tour for free.
  • Dubai City Tour ticket sales are final and are 100% non-refundable.
  • Visitors are not allowed to bring glassware or alcohol into the premises.
  Important things to know before your visit
  • Dubai City Tour Dress Code: Smart casual clothing is allowed during the tour.
  • Dubai City Tour Age and Health Restrictions: The Dubai City Tour is suitable for people of all ages, including expecting mothers.
  • Please inform the staff while booking the tour whether you need child seats.
How to get there:
For this tour, guests will be provided pick-up and drop-off from their location. Join our tour to uncover the hidden secrets of Dubai with our amiable English-speaking tour guide. Explore the heart of the city during a captivating morning tour, delving into the surprises that Dubai, the most modern and sought-after tourist destination, has to offer.  

Begin with a visit to the Gold Souk and Spice Souk, providing an opportunity to purchase souvenirs for your loved ones. Enjoy a drive through the iconic 'Dubai Frame,' the world's largest frame, followed by a journey along Sheikh Zayed Road towards Burj Khalifa. Continue to Palm Island, with a photo stop at 'The Pointe,' offering a stunning view of Atlantis The Palm. Explore Madinat Souk to witness the captivating Burj Al Arab before concluding the tour with a return to the hotel.
data.text_teaser: Explore the glorious city in all its glory with this exciting tour!

data.name: Abu Dhabi Private City Tour from Dubai with Transfers
data.description:
Visit the Capital of UAE - Abu Dhabi. The architectural brilliance or modern enforcements in terms of infrastructure. The city corniche - well-maintained waterfront which gives stunning views of the city & beautiful buildings within such as Etihad Towers, Emirates Palace hotel, Sheikh Zayed Mosque, Louvre Museum & more. Not only this, it is home to amusement parks such as Yas marina, Ferrari world, Warner bros & more. Our first stop is at the breath-taking Sheikh Zayed Mosque for a photo stop. We then driver through Emirates Palace (The guests who has reservations can enter the Palace). Our route takes us along a scenic drive along the Riviera styled Abu Dhabi Corniche past the intriguing sights of the capital known for its sky scrapers, palaces and villas before heading to Marjan gallery to see different kinds of souvenirs and traditional carpets, dress etc. We then head to visit the Dates market. Our tour ends with a drive through Louvre Museum & photo stop at Ferrari park before heading back to Dubai.

Highlights
  • Visit the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque
  • Drive Through Emirates Palace
  • Photostop to Corniche
  • Visit Marjan
  • Visit Dates Market
  • Drive through Louvre Museum
  • Photostop to Ferrari World

Inclusions:
  • Pick up and drop off in private transfers
  • Full day tour with English speaking driver
  • Visit to above mentioned touristic locations

Exclusions:
  • Ticket entry to any attraction
  • Food and drinks

Timing: 
  • From 09:00 am to 05:00 pm (8 hours)
  • From 09:00 am to 07:00 pm (10 hours)
  • The pick-up time will be shared on the voucher

Ticket Information: 
  • Abu Dhabi City Tour ticket sales are final and are 100% non-refundable
    Important things to know before your visit
  • Abu Dhabi City Tour Dress Code: Appropriate clothing is required for the tour to enter the mosque Flip-flops and shorts are not allowed.
  • Age and Health Restrictions: The tour is suitable for people of all ages, including expecting mothers.
How to get there:
For this tour, guests will be provided pick-up and drop-off from their location. Visit the Capital of UAE - Abu Dhabi. The architectural brilliance or modern enforcements in terms of infrastructure. The city corniche - well-maintained waterfront which gives stunning views of the city & beautiful buildings within such as Etihad Towers, Emirates Palace hotel, Sheikh Zayed Mosque, Louvre Museum & more. Not only this, it is home to amusement parks such as Yas marina, Ferrari world, Warner bros & more.  

Our first stop is at the breath-taking Sheikh Zayed Mosque for a photo stop. We then driver through Emirates Palace (The guests who has reservations can enter the Palace). Our route takes us along a scenic drive along the Riviera styled Abu Dhabi Corniche past the intriguing sights of the capital known for its sky scrapers, palaces and villas before heading to Marjan gallery to see different kinds of souvenirs and traditional carpets, dress etc. We then head to visit the Dates market. Our tour ends with a drive through Louvre Museum & photo stop at Ferrari park before heading back to Dubai.
data.text_teaser: Unveil the Jewels of Abu Dhabi on this full-day tour from Dubai!

data.name: Morning Desert Safari Dubai with Dune Bashing, Sand Boarding & Camel Ride
data.description:
Experience an exhilarating morning desert safari in Dubai, starting with a hotel pick-up in a 4x4 Land Cruiser, followed by a thrilling 35-45 minutes of dune bashing across the Lahbab Red Dunes. Take in the breathtaking desert scenery and feel the adrenaline rush as the Land Cruiser navigates the sandy terrain. Capture unforgettable moments with sandboarding, a popular desert activity, and enjoy optional quad biking. Afterwards, immerse yourself in Arabian hospitality at the Al Khayma camp, where you'll be treated to traditional Arabic coffee, sweets, and dates. Relax and embark on a short camel ride in the nearby area before concluding your adventure and being transported back to your hotel. Discover the best of Dubai's desert landscape with this unforgettable morning safari.

Highlights
  • Enjoy a morning safari in the Dubai Desert
  • Experience the excitement of a dune-bashing adventure in a 4x4 Land Cruiser
  • Try sandboarding, fast becoming one of the most popular desert activities and drive the optional off-road quad bike
  • Immerse yourself in the charm of the Al Khayma traditional camp and embark on an unforgettable camel ride experience.
  What’s included in the ticket
  • Clean, air-conditioned 4x4 Land Cruiser
  • Pickup and drop-off in Dubai
  • Dune bashing (30-45 minutes)
  • Sandboarding and photos stop
  • A professional licensed safari guide
  • A short camel ride (which can be repeated)
  • Cold mineral water
Not included: 
  • Quad bike (optional)
Timing: 

Pickup time - Summer: 7:00 AM | Winter: 7:45AM 
The tour ends at 12:00 p.m.   

Ticket Information: 
  • Morning Desert Safari Dubai Ticket sales are final and are 100% non-refundable. 
Important things to know before your visit
Age and Health Restrictions: 
  • Infants (under the age of 3) are not allowed in the car during the dune-bashing drive
  • This activity is not allowed for pregnant women or those who have back, neck, or heart problems
  • It is recommended that you do not to eat 2 to 3 hours before the safari trip to avoid sickness during the dune bashing
  • Self-practicing quad biking is solely your responsibility. It is strongly recommended that you listen to and follow the tour leader. Please note that any damage, injuries sustained or items lost during quad biking are not covered by insurance
How to get there:
Complimentary pickup is available from Dubai city hotels, apartments, and Cruise terminal Dubai ( Port Rashid).

Pickup from Bab Al Shams, Al Maha Resort, and Jebel Ali is available with an additional fee. On shared tours the actual pick-up time will be within 45 minutes of your selected pickup time, Please be ready at the hotel lobby on time. Experience an exhilarating morning desert safari in Dubai, starting with a hotel pick-up in a 4x4 Land Cruiser, followed by a thrilling 30-45 minutes of dune bashing across the Lahbab Red Dunes.

Take in the breathtaking desert scenery and feel the adrenaline rush as the Land Cruiser navigates the sandy terrain. Capture unforgettable moments with sandboarding, a popular desert activity, and enjoy optional quad biking.

Afterwards, immerse yourself in Arabian hospitality at the Al Khayma camp, where you'll be treated to traditional Arabic coffee, sweets, and dates. Relax and embark on a short camel ride in the nearby area chance to interact with falcons before concluding your adventure and being transported back to your hotel.

Discover the best of Dubai's desert landscape with this unforgettable morning safari.
data.text_teaser: Discover the desert's wonders: dune bashing, camel rides, and Arabian hospitality!
